examples.example: 我逐渐习惯了每天早起锻炼，感觉精神状态越来越好。

translate.english: I gradually got used to getting up early and exercising every day, and felt that my mental state was getting better and better.

examples.example: 我已经习惯了在遇到困难时积极面对，努力寻找解决办法。

translate.english: I have already been accustomed to facing difficulties positively and striving to find solutions when encountering them.

examples.example: 我习惯在闲暇时光阅读书籍，享受知识带来的乐趣。

translate.english: I am accustomed to reading books in my spare time and enjoying the pleasure brought by knowledge.
